subject: Re: [Important] We couldn't charge your Card
preview: Apologies - yes that's fine. It didn't download into my phone until I tapped it!  Regards  Paul  THE FOOT SPOT Podiatric Medical Centre  The Foot Spot Pty Ltd Shop 76-78 St Paul's Street Randwick NSW

full_threads.body:
Apologies - yes that's fine. It didn't download into my phone until I tapped it!

Regards

Paul

Hi Paul, 

You are very welcome. Regarding the invoice, is the one attached to my previous email sufficient?

Appreciate it guys - If you could send through the invoice again for the works I can forward to finance and they will pay it ASAP.

Regards

Paul

THE FOOT SPOT
Podiatric Medical Centre

The Foot Spot Pty Ltd
Shop 76-78 St Paul's Street
Randwick NSW 2031
Phone +61 29326 3777

If you have received this communication in error, please notify by reply e-mail and immediately and permanently delete this message and any attachments sent with it.

Morning Paul,

Again my sincerest apologies. I hope the cards etc. are unlocked now.

To soften the burden of the time on the phone yesterday, your first 2 months of hosting is on us. I can't get you that time back, but hopefully, this helps.

I have attached the invoice as requested as well.

Hi Heath

This has triggered massive issues on our end. It locked all our accounts including company credit cards as I assume they thought it was fraud.

I've been on the phone since 7am trying to sort it out.

Could you generate an invoice and email it over so I can send to our finance company for their approval.

Regards

Paul

THE FOOT SPOT
Podiatric Medical Centre

The Foot Spot Pty Ltd
Shop 76-78 St Paul's Street
Randwick NSW 2031
Phone +61 29326 3777
Fax +61 28964 9852
www.thefootspot.com.au

If you are not the intended recipient, any disclosure, copying, use, or distribution of the information included in this message and any attachments is prohibited. If you have received this communication in error, please notify by reply e-mail and immediately and permanently delete this message and any attachments sent with it.

Hi Paul, 

Jumping in here to apologise. We are transitioning to a new accounting/billing platform in line with our recent merger. This was a complete oversight on our behalf. The system is almost too proactive with collecting payments. 

We are fully aware that this project will be financed and I have switched off the automated payment of this invoice. When you/finance are ready to pay, this can be done via bank transfer. 

Again apologies for the mix up. 

Regards,

action.text: Workflow **Assign email to Accounts team [RR]** was triggered

full_threads.body:
Hi Chris

As discussed this has to go through finance for the new clinic - NOT on CC. I'm not sure why this would have been attempted to be billed all at one go through my CC (this was never discussed), but now I've got American Express jumping up and down on the phone to me about this new credit card and $7500k of bounced charges.

Can you halt trying to bill my CC for this as it will be coming from finance.

As discussed I need an itemized invoice from you to present to finance so they can authorize the payment.

Regards

Paul Bowles



THE FOOT SPOT
Podiatric Medical Centre

The Foot Spot Pty Ltd
Shop 76-78 St Paul's Street
Randwick NSW 2031
Phone +61 29326 3777
Fax +61 28964 9852
